component.name: Vinegar
component.summary: A feature-packed small and fast bootstrapper for Roblox

description.p: Vinegar is a fast and robust bootstrapper for Roblox that has many ease-of-use features.

screenshot.caption: Vinegar gameplay of Phantom Forces, an experience on Roblox

ul.li: Fixed default channel check for manifest path
AVX block is now a warning
Dropped Global ([global]) configuration directive. Please use [env] as opposed to [global.env], and move your global options to each binary ([player] and [studio]) as needed
nosplash support is dropped (build-time splash, splash can still be disabled via configuration)
Require AVX before doing anything, if AVX is not present, vinegar will immediately exit with a dialog message.
Switched to the drpc discord rpc library, fixes some problems such as Flatpak discord RPC.
Error dialog now appears upon Binary failure
Vinegar will ask the user if they would like to submit hardware information to Merlin via dialog
